enb_long_title: TWELFTH SESSION OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES OF THE UNFCCC
sentences: The spirit of cooperation generated during the informal meetings was shaken late Monday, when tensions in negotiations in the contact group on adverse effects spilled over into the mechanisms group in what many saw as tit-for-tat reprisals.

The apparent reluctance of some Annex I Parties to discuss a consolidated text based on Parties' proposals on adverse effects sparked a response in the mechanisms group from Saudi Arabia, who sought to bring the meeting to an abrupt halt.
Several delegates observed that the incident underlined the difficulties in moving forward on a 'package' given some Parties' insistence on simultaneous progress on all issues.
Others also noted that divisions within the G-77/China on adverse effects were becoming more apparent by the day.
